original_text: The king of Babylon's officers came into Jerusalem. They sat at the Middle Gate of the city. The officers were Nergal-Sharezer from Samgar, an important officer called Nebo-Sarsekim, and another important officer, also called Nergal-Sharezer. All the other officers of the king of Babylon met with them there.
korean_text: 바벨론의 왕의 모든 고관이 나타나 중문에 앉으니 곧 네르갈사레셀과 삼갈네부와 내시장 살스김이니 네르갈사레셀은 궁중 장관이며 바벨론의 왕의 나머지 고관들도 있더라

sentences.original_text: The king of Babylon's officers came into Jerusalem.
They sat at the Middle Gate of the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 성의 중간 문에 앉아 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The officers were Nergal-Sharezer from Samgar,
and another important officer, also called Nergal-Sharezer.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네르갈사레셀이라 불리는 또 다른 중요한 관원이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: All the other officers of the king of Babylon met with them there.
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕의 다른 모든 관원들이 그들과 거기서 만났습니다.
